summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1447, for the improvement of 1st Avenue West, 2nd Avenue West, 3rd Avenue West, each from McGraw Street to Ray Street, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 15613 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
